conversations.content: 2nd month, 4th day. Weather clear. We all played a game today. Nobody could stop Mercury.
2nd month, 10th day. Weather clear. We went to Moo York today and visited the Entire State Building! Phoenix was really fired up!
3rd month, 5th day. Weather cloudy. Zodiark spent all day staring at a line of ants.
3rd month, 15th day. Weather hot. ...Thanks to Agni.
3rd month, 17th day. Weather ??? Stayed inside and watched a movie with Brunhilda. She cries when she watches romance films. Who knew?
3rd month, 19th day. Pitch black. All the dragons got together for a party today. And Jupiter flew! I didn't know he could do that...
3rd month, 25th day. Cheerful! Everyone lounged in the sun today because of the nice weather. Before we knew it, the sun had set. I hope the weather's nice tomorrow!
